aboutPage.title: About Us
aboutPage.subtitle: Your trusted partner for premium quality coconuts directly from the rich soil of Pollachi.
aboutPage.aboutDesc1: Welcome to AA Coconut Enterprises. Located in the heart of Zamin Uthukuli, Pollachi, we are a leading supplier and exporter of high-grade coconuts. Pollachi is globally renowned for its ideal climate and red soil, which produces coconuts that are superior in taste, size, and shelf life.
aboutPage.aboutDesc2: Much like the renowned Amudhasurabi standards, we ensure that every coconut we supply is handpicked from the best farms. Our coconuts are famous for their high water content, thick and sweet kernel (meat), and high oil percentage. We are committed to delivering freshness and quality to our customers across India and overseas.

features.highOil: High oil content and thick, sweet meat
features.directProcurement: Direct procurement from Zamin Uthukuli farmers
features.qualityGrading: Strict quality grading for size and weight

servicesPage.title: Our Services
servicesPage.subtitle: Expert Handling from Tree to Truck

organicCultivation.title: Organic Cultivation
organicCultivation.desc: We grow coconuts using organic manure and sustainable farming practices in Zamin Uthukuli.

deHusking.title: De-Husking
deHusking.desc: Professional de-husking service to provide semi-husked and fully husked nuts based on client requirements.

grading.title: Grading & Sorting
grading.desc: Strict quality checks to sort coconuts by size (12/13 inches) and weight to ensure export quality.

hybridSeedlings.title: Hybrid Seedlings
hybridSeedlings.desc: We supply high-yield coconut seedlings, nurtured in our nurseries for better productivity.

copraDrying.title: Copra Drying
copraDrying.desc: Natural sun-drying and hygienic processing of copra to ensure high oil percentage for milling.

exportPacking.title: Export Packing
exportPacking.desc: Secure packing in Gunny/PP bags (25/50 nuts) ensuring safe transit for international shipping.

dripIrrigation.title: Drip Irrigation
dripIrrigation.desc: Advanced watering systems to ensure consistent yield and heavy coconuts throughout the year.

wholesaleSupply.title: Wholesale Supply
wholesaleSupply.desc: Bulk supply of fresh coconuts to markets and industries across India at competitive prices.

processing.title: PROCESSING PROCEDURE
processing.subtitle: Ensuring Excellence in Every Coconut
processing.processDesc: At AA Coconut Enterprises, we maintain the highest standards of quality. Our processing involves:
processing.sourcing: Sourcing: Direct from Zamin Uthukuli farms.
processing.dehusking: De-Husking: Careful manual husking to protect the shell.
processing.grading: Grading: Sorting by size (12-13 inches) and weight.
processing.packing: Packing: Using breathable PP/Gunny bags for export.

qualityControl.title: Quality Control
qualityControl.desc: We inspect every single coconut for cracks, water sound, and freshness before it leaves our facility. This ensures that our customers receive only A-Grade Pollachi coconuts with long shelf life and high oil content.

packaging.title: Packaging Standards
packaging.desc: To prevent damage during transit, we use high-strength packaging materials. We offer customized bag sizes (25 nuts or 50 nuts per bag) to suit the needs of wholesalers and exporters alike.

freshCoconuts.title: Pollachi Fresh Coconuts
freshCoconuts.desc: Known for their sweet water, thick meat, and high oil content. Available in all sizes.

copra.title: Edible & Milling Copra
copra.desc: High-grade, sun-dried copra perfectly suited for oil extraction and culinary use.

tenderCoconuts.title: Tender Coconuts
tenderCoconuts.desc: Rich in electrolytes and natural sweetness, harvested daily for maximum freshness.

servicesPage.expertise: Over 20 years of expertise in the Coconut Industry
servicesPage.commitment: AA Coconut Enterprises is committed to delivering the authentic taste of Pollachi to the world. Our farming and processing methods ensure sustainability and quality.
servicesPage.locationDesc: Sourced from Zamin Uthukuli's rich red soil.
